name: Vehicle Race 3D
description:
Easy to play, hard to put down. This brand new racing game will allow you discover dozens of environments and drive dozens of vehicles. Can you choose the right vehicle to past your opponent?



Sometimes you need a motorbike, sometimes a jet ski. In this amazing game, you can fly, mow the grass, clear the way, hover through the water… and if you are skilled enough, you can even ride a unicorn!


How fast can you change your vehicle? Play to find out.
